dmca.title: Born-Again-Christian.Info Complains of Infringement (#2)
dmca.body:
Reply to: [private]@born-again-christian.info

14th Nov 2003

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA  94043  USA

DMCA Complaint of Copyright Violation

I am the sole owner of the website born-again-christian.com which has had original copyright material, authored by me, taken from it without permission and posted on webpages listed in Google.  Please remove all the infringing pages from your index immediately and kindly reply to [private]@born-again-christian.info confirming your compliance with our request in accordance with DMCA.

Here follow details of the infringement:

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on our website at:
http://www.born-again-christian.info/maria.woodworth.eller.htm

The infringer
